post.body:
Update: Decentralize the Word!

I think it is time to decentralize and distribute the Holy Word, the Bible! To make it uncensorable and intact. By doing this we will allow everyone to freely access the Bible, and allow everyone to find our wonderful and glorious Father !

Poem: Hope in the Morning

Hope in the Morning

When I do not know
Where the sun may go
When it hides away
And I can no longer see it anymore
What gives me hope
Is that it will soon return
Because the promise of tomorrow is not a given
But rather the rays of warmth and comfort
Is promised forever more

The sun will come back, come back another day
But you can not let go
Due to the results of you no longer seeing the light
If you give up hope now
And allow yourself to fall and stumble
And never get back up
You will no longer see the light
All you see is the dark cold dirt, that surrounds you


IPFS Hash - QmNQWwep9YcNjFkq1wjJUzbt3N8DKao7JtynSZWA5KajuU

Poem: Under Impression

Under Impression

The wallows and howling speech of men
Passes not too far within
The convoluted ideas of humans
Only brings us closer to sin
But at least we are under the impression
That life is great and we think we have peace within
When we crash and burn 
And blame God for everything
When in reality
We were under the impression
That we are the superior
And peace and life is given in return
We try to think we are in control
But we are still under the impression
The impression of our continuing sin

IPFS Hash - QmYoWPPrRYWr3fzxyd1JobwK5CMxvs9aEr6XY36qmoAj8F
